16 template<typename T, class allocator>
17 class shm_array {
18 
19  public:
20  typedef T value_type;
21  typedef uint64_t size_type;
22  typedef const value_type &const_reference;
23 
24  static int typeId();
25 
26  shm_array(const allocator &alloc = allocator())
27  : m_type(typeId())
28  , m_refcount(0)
29  , m_size(0)
30  , m_capacity(0)
31  , m_data(nullptr)
32  , m_allocator(alloc)
33  {
34  resize(0);
35  }
36 
37  shm_array(const size_t size, const allocator &alloc = allocator())
38  : m_type(typeId())
39  , m_refcount(0)
40  , m_size(0)
41  , m_capacity(0)
42  , m_data(nullptr)
43  , m_allocator(alloc)
44  {
45  resize(size);
46  }
47 
48  shm_array(const size_t size, const T &value, const allocator &alloc = allocator())
49  : m_type(typeId())
50  , m_refcount(0)
51  , m_size(0)
52  , m_capacity(0)
53  , m_data(nullptr)
54  , m_allocator(alloc)
55  {
56  resize(size, value);
57  }
58 
59  shm_array(shm_array &&other)
60  : m_type(other.m_type)
61  , m_refcount(0)
62  , m_size(other.m_size)
63  , m_capacity(other.m_capacity)
64  , m_data(other.m_data)
65  , m_allocator(other.m_allocator)
66  {
67  other.m_data = nullptr;
68  other.m_size = 0;
69  other.m_capacity = 0;
70  assert(typeId() == m_type);
71  }
72 
73  ~shm_array() {
74  assert(m_refcount == 0);
75  reserve_or_shrink(0);
76  }
77 
78  int type() const { return m_type; }
79  bool check() const {
80  assert(m_refcount >= 0);
81  assert(m_size <= m_capacity);
82  if (m_refcount < 0)
83  return false;
84  if (m_size > m_capacity)
85  return false;
86  if (m_dim[0]!=0 && m_size != m_dim[0]*m_dim[1]*m_dim[2])
87  return false;
88  return true;
89  }
90 
91  typedef typename allocator::pointer pointer;
92  typedef T *iterator;
93  typedef const T *const_iterator;
94 
95  iterator begin() const { return &*m_data; }
96  iterator end() const { return (&*m_data) + m_size; }
97  T *data() const { return &*m_data; }
98 
99  T &operator[](const size_t idx) { return m_data[idx]; }
100  T &operator[](const size_t idx) const { return m_data[idx]; }
101  T &at(const size_t idx) { if (idx >= m_size) throw(std::out_of_range("shm_array")); return m_data[idx]; }
102  T &at(const size_t idx) const { if (idx >= m_size) throw(std::out_of_range("shm_array")); return m_data[idx]; }
103 
104  void push_back(const T &v) {
105  if (m_size >= m_capacity)
106  reserve(m_capacity==0 ? 1 : m_capacity*2);
107  assert(m_size < m_capacity);
108  new(&m_data[m_size])T(v);
109  ++m_size;
110  }
111 
112  template <class... Args>
113  void emplace_back(Args &&...args) {
114  if (m_size >= m_capacity)
115  reserve(m_capacity==0 ? 1 : m_capacity*2);
116  assert(m_size < m_capacity);
117  new(&m_data[m_size])T(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
118  ++m_size;
119  }
120 
121  T &back() { return m_data[m_size-1]; }
122  T &front() { return m_data[0]; }
123 
124  bool empty() const { return m_size == 0; }
125  void clear() { resize(0); }
126 
127  size_t size() const { return m_size; }
128  void resize(const size_t size) {
129  reserve(size);
130  if (!std::is_trivially_copyable<T>::value) {
131  for (size_t i=m_size; i<size; ++i)
132  new(&m_data[i])T();
133  }
134  m_size = size;
135  assert(m_size <= m_capacity);
136  clearDimensionHint();
137  }
138  void resize(const size_t size, const T &value) {
139  reserve(size);
140  for (size_t i=m_size; i<size; ++i)
141  new(&m_data[i])T(value);
142  m_size = size;
143  assert(m_size <= m_capacity);
144  clearDimensionHint();
145  }
146 
147  void clearDimensionHint() {
148  m_dim[0] = 0;
149  m_dim[1] = m_dim[2] = 1;
150  }
151  void setDimensionHint(const size_t sx, const size_t sy=1, const size_t sz=1){
152  assert(m_size == sx*sy*sz);
153  m_dim[0] = sx;
154  m_dim[1] = sy;
155  m_dim[2] = sz;
156  }
157  void setExact(bool exact) {
158  m_exact = exact;
159  }
160 
161  size_t capacity() const { return m_capacity; }
162  void reserve(const size_t new_capacity) {
163  if (new_capacity > capacity())
164  reserve_or_shrink(new_capacity);
165  }
166  void reserve_or_shrink(const size_t capacity) {
167  pointer new_data = capacity>0 ? m_allocator.allocate(capacity) : nullptr;
168  const size_t n = capacity<m_size ? capacity : m_size;
169  if (m_data && new_data) {
170  if (std::is_trivially_copyable<T>::value) {
171  ::memcpy(&*new_data, &*m_data, sizeof(T)*n);
172  } else {
173  for (size_t i=0; i<n; ++i) {
174  new(&new_data[i])T(std::move(m_data[i]));
175  }
176  }
177  }
178  if (m_data) {
179  if (!std::is_trivially_copyable<T>::value) {
180  for (size_t i=n; i<m_size; ++i) {
181  m_data[i].~T();
182  }
183  }
184  m_allocator.deallocate(m_data, m_capacity);
185  }
186  m_data = new_data;
187  m_capacity = capacity;
188  }
189  void shrink_to_fit() { reserve_or_shrink(m_size); assert(m_capacity == m_size); }
190 
191  int ref() const { assert(m_refcount >= 0); return ++m_refcount; }
192  int unref() const { assert(m_refcount > 0); return --m_refcount; }
193  int refcount() const { assert(m_refcount >= 0); return m_refcount; }
194 
195  private:
196  const uint32_t m_type;
197  mutable std::atomic<int> m_refcount;
198  size_t m_size = 0;
199  size_t m_dim[3] = {0, 1, 1};
200  size_t m_capacity = 0;
201  bool m_exact = std::is_integral<T>::value;
202  pointer m_data;
203  allocator m_allocator;
204 
205  ARCHIVE_ACCESS_SPLIT
206  template<class Archive>
207  void save(Archive &ar) const;
208  template<class Archive>
209  void load(Archive &ar);
210 
211  // not implemented
212  shm_array(const shm_array &other) = delete;
213  shm_array &operator=(const shm_array &rhs) = delete;
214 };
215 
216 } // namespace vistle

224 namespace vistle {
225 
226 template<typename T, class allocator>
227 template<class Archive>
228 void shm_array<T, allocator>::save(Archive &ar) const {
229  ar & V_NAME(ar, "type", m_type);
230  ar & V_NAME(ar, "size", size_type(m_size));
231  ar & V_NAME(ar, "exact", m_exact);
232  //std::cerr << "saving array: exact=" << m_exact << ", size=" << m_size << std::endl;
233  if (m_size > 0) {
234  if (m_dim[0]*m_dim[1]*m_dim[2] == m_size)
235  ar & V_NAME(ar, "elements", detail::wrap_array<Archive>(&m_data[0], m_exact, m_dim[0], m_dim[1], m_dim[2]));
236  else
237  ar & V_NAME(ar, "elements", detail::wrap_array<Archive>(&m_data[0], m_exact, m_size));
238  }
239 }
240 
241 template<typename T, class allocator>
242 template<class Archive>
243 void shm_array<T, allocator>::load(Archive &ar) {
244  uint32_t type = 0;
245  ar & V_NAME(ar, "type", type);
246  assert(m_type == type);
247  size_type size = 0;
248  ar & V_NAME(ar, "size", size);
249  resize(size);
250  ar & V_NAME(ar, "exact", m_exact);
251  if (m_size > 0) {
252  if (m_dim[0]*m_dim[1]*m_dim[2] == m_size)
253  ar & V_NAME(ar, "elements", detail::wrap_array<Archive>(&m_data[0], m_exact, m_dim[0], m_dim[1], m_dim[2]));
254  else
255  ar & V_NAME(ar, "elements", detail::wrap_array<Archive>(&m_data[0], m_exact, m_size));
256  }
257 }
258
